header.title: Personal User Notes
header.description: This MOD allows users to create private notes within the UCP. Notes allow emoticons and bbcode, and can be easily posted into forums in which the user has posting permissions.
header.author-notes: If you would like to make a donation for my work done on this MOD as well as other MODs, you may do so by going to my development forum (http://www.phpbbdevelopers.net/) and clicking the Donate button in the header. All donations are voluntary but appreciated.

action-group.diy-instructions: Once all file edits have been done and the SQL install file has been run, enter the ACP and purge the cache and refresh the templates on which this MOD has been installed. Be sure to set the permissions so that users can access and use this MOD.
